attributes.action: Hold a general election when the PM changes for any reason whilst in office
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the infighting and political maneuvers that destabilise government reducing thier effectiveness and delivery to the people, changevthe rules such that a change of PM instantly  forces a general election giving the people control and not party activists.

Recent times have shown how our countries finances are negatively affected by actions such as outisting a PM. If the PM cant serve for any reason, the choice of government should come back to the people and force a general election

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

If a Prime Minister resigns a general election should be called: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620016
